measures: GROSS MARGIN PRE FREIGHT PER UNIT ($)
GROSS MARGIN PRE FREIGHT PER UNIT ($)
GROSS MARGIN PRE FREIGHT PER UNIT ($)

query.pigql: q = load "CustomerProfitability1"; q1 = filter q by date('DUE_DATE1_Year', 'DUE_DATE1_Month', 'DUE_DATE1_Day') in ["current day".."current day"]; q1 = group q1 by 'DUE_DATE1_Day';  q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE1_Day' as 'DUE_DATE1_Day', avg('DUE_DATE2_Day') as 'avg_CurrentDay', 0 as 'avg_DateDay';  q2 = filter q by  {{column(Day_1.selection,["DUE_DATE1_Day"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE1_Day")}};  q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE1_Day';  q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE1_Day' as 'DUE_DATE1_Day', 0 as 'avg_CurrentDay', avg('DUE_DATE2_Day') as 'avg_DateDay';  u = union q1,q2;  u = group u by all;  u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DateDay')> 31 then 0 else (sum('avg_DateDay')-sum('avg_CurrentDay')) end) as 'Day_Diff';
